statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_temp > 30;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 70 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity >= 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-10 23:59:59'
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM humidity_data ORDER BY humidity ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, sensor_id FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) as data_count FROM humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature) as max_temp, MIN(temperature) as min_temp FROM temperature_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_temp > 30 AND min_temp < 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM temperature_data;
SELECT timestamp, value, id FROM humidity_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM temperature_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_metadata;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM temperature_data WHERE value > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_metadata.location, temperature_data.timestamp, temperature_data.value FROM temperature_data JOIN sensor_metadata ON temperature_data.id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE temperature_data.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY temperature_data.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sensor_metadata.location, humidity_data.timestamp, humidity_data.value FROM humidity_data JOIN sensor_metadata ON humidity_data.id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE humidity_data.value < 50 ORDER BY humidity_data.timestamp DESC LIMIT 8;

SELECT sensor_metadata.location, temperature_data.timestamp, temperature_data.value, humidity_data.timestamp, humidity_data.value FROM temperature_data JOIN humidity_data ON temperature_data.id = humidity_data.id JOIN sensor_metadata ON temperature_data.id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE temperature_data.value > 25 AND humidity_data.value < 60 ORDER BY temperature_data.timestamp DESC, humidity_data.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT temperature_data.id, sensor_metadata.location FROM temperature_data JOIN sensor_metadata ON temperature_data.id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id WHERE sensor_metadata.location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY temperature_data.id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature >= 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT sensors.id, sensor_type, location, temperature, humidity, sensor_logs.log_message FROM sensors INNER JOIN temperature_data ON sensors.id = temperature_data.sensor_id INNER JOIN humidity_data ON sensors.id = humidity_data.sensor_id INNER JOIN sensor_logs ON sensors.id = sensor_logs.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY sensors.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, sensor_id FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM SensorLog ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorStatus WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) as avg_temperature FROM TemperatureData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temperature > 20
SELECT SensorLocation.location, TemperatureData.temperature FROM SensorLocation JOIN TemperatureData ON SensorLocation.sensor_id = TemperatureData.sensor_id
SELECT SensorLog.log_id, SensorLog.timestamp, SensorStatus.status FROM SensorLog JOIN SensorStatus ON SensorLog.sensor_id = SensorStatus.sensor_id WHERE SensorStatus.status = 'active'
